import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' function InfosContact({ activePage, setActivePage, inputStyle, labelStyle, newStudent, setNewStudent }) { const handleClickNext = () => setActivePage(activePage + 1) const handleClickPrev = () => setActivePage(activePage - 1) const [tel1, setTel1] = useState('') const [tel2, setTel2] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [quater, setQuater] = useState('') useEffect(() => setNewStudent(...newStudent, tel1, tel2, email, quater)) return (
